name: Wuilt, Inc.
description: Operator of a website-building portal intended to help users create professional websites. The company gives them more control over their brand and customer experience and allows brands to create their own custom online store without having to worry about the technical aspects of running an e-commerce business, enabling users to take the hassle out of web design and build their own websites.
one_liner: Operator of a website-building portal intended to help users create professional websites. The company gives them more control over their brand and customer experience and allows brands to create their own custom online store without having to worry about the technical aspects of running an e-commerce business, enabling users to take the hassle out of web design and build their own websites.
